casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Marshall HAMMETT. No. 83A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2006. Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC. Daniel R. Pollitt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Eric Marshall Hammett.

*616The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of February 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of February 2006."
